forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High 53F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear this evening then becoming mostly cloudy with snow showers developing after midnight. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies this evening will give way to occasional snow showers overnight. Low 29F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning turning to all snow in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning, becoming all snow in the afternoon. High 38F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 22F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. High 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. High 37F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 18F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 8C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 47F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low -3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 26F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High around 10C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High around 50F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low -3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 26F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 48F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intermittent snow showers, especially early. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers will become more widely scattered later on. Low 26F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers later in the day. High 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers later in the day. High 44F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intermittent snow showers, especially early. Low -4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers will become more widely scattered later on. Low near 25F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 44F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 7C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High near 45F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Snow showers around after midnight. Low -4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies with late-night snow showers. Low around 25F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered snow flurries and snow showers before noon. Becoming partly cloudy later. High 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: On and off snow showers early. Peeks of sunshine later. High near 45F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low -3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 26F. Winds light and variable.
